name: Chidi Tanks (0.3 Alpha)
description:
Welcome to Chidi Tanks!

(Nicknames must be > 3 characters)

Controls :

Drive-Arrow Keys

Shoot- Semicolon

Rotate Cannon- K,L

Brake-  J

NEW MAPS ADDED

The one with the rotating wall is especially "fun".

HOW TO JOIN ROOM-

The password must be the same as whoever "created" the room. For example, if someone types "ABC" for create room, you type "ABC" to join the room.

I already have items implemented, so I will add them soon.
